name: draw_text
description: Draw text to the screen using simulated keyboard input. The input_description and output_description are used to build a plan for the actual output.

input_description.description: Description of what was detected in the input image. Include the x,y,w,h bounding box coordinates of interesting regions.

output_description.description: Description of what will be output. Include x,y,w,h bounding box coordinates of specific regions.
